tool_description: This API generates a random ethereum public address with its private key
title: Ethereum random address generator. ETH key pairs generator

api_list.name: eth
api_list.description: This API generates a random ethereum public address with its private key
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-random-address-generator-eth-key-pairs-generator.p.rapidapi.com/eth"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-random-address-generator-eth-key-pairs-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
